summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Villa Paris Gestionale. All features working correctly including AppShell layout, sidebar navigation, and all 8 pages (Dashboard, Calendario, Eventi, Clienti, Menu Base, Report, Stampe, Impostazioni). Mobile responsiveness verified.

issues: External preview URL (*.preview.emergentagent.com) shows 'Preview Unavailable' - app only accessible via localhost:3000. This is infrastructure issue, not app issue.

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with AppShell layout (dark sidebar + topbar)
All 8 sidebar menu items present and navigable: Dashboard, Calendario, Eventi, Clienti, Menu Base, Report, Stampe, Impostazioni
Villa Paris branding in sidebar with VP logo and amber accent colors
Footer displays correct Villa Paris branding and version v1.0.0
Calendario page: FullCalendar component renders correctly with month/week views
Calendario page: Date picker 'Vai a:' allows navigation
Calendario page: Legend shows event types (Matrimonio, Compleanno, Comunione, etc.)
Menu Base page: Create new menu with name, price, and piatti
Menu Base page: Add dishes by category (Antipasti, Primi, Secondi, etc.)
Menu Base page: Save menu persists to database
Menu Base page: List shows all created menus with expand/collapse
Menu Base page: Copy, Edit, Delete buttons functional
Impostazioni page: All sections present (Dati Azienda, Documenti PDF, Notifiche, Info Sistema)
Impostazioni page: Save settings with localStorage persistence
Impostazioni page: Success message appears after save
Eventi page: Filter controls (Anno, Mese, Tipo, Stato) present
Eventi page: Events list displays with status badges
Clienti page: Client cards with contact info and event links
Clienti page: Export buttons (Stampa, Esporta Excel) present
Stampe page: Document types explained (Pacchetto Cliente, Documento Operativo)
Stampe page: Event list with Visualizza and Stampa buttons
Report Azienda page: KPI cards (Eventi Totali, Ospiti, Ricavi, Ticket Medio)
Report Azienda page: Charts render (Ricavi per Mese, Eventi per Mese)
Report Azienda page: Excel export button present
Mobile responsiveness: Sidebar hidden initially, toggles on menu button click
Mobile responsiveness: All content readable and functional on mobile viewport
API /api/menu-base: Returns menu list correctly
API /api/eventi: Returns events with client relations
API /api/clienti: Returns clients list

success_rate.backend: 100% - All Next.js API routes working correctly
success_rate.frontend: 100% - All pages load, navigate, and function as expected

seed_data_creation: Created 2 test menus via UI testing: 'Test Menu Playwright' (€75) and 'Menu Matrimonio Premium' (€95, with 1 antipasto)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. App uses Next.js 15 with SQLite (Prisma). Sidebar navigation via AppShell component. External preview URL not working but localhost:3000 works perfectly. Settings saved to localStorage, not backend API.
note: External preview URL (https://9643d57b-0776-4222-ad2e-5cab57d53739.preview.emergentagent.com) shows 'Preview Unavailable' - this is an infrastructure/environment issue not related to the app code. All testing done via localhost:3000 which works correctly.
